mod.name: JesterMod
mod.description: Adds the Jester character with his own deck and relics.

cards.name: Detonate
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies when drawn.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Detonate+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Deal 14 damage to ALL enemies when drawn.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Hopeless
cards.description:
Unplayable.
At the end of your turn, gain 1 Vulnerable and 1 Weakened.
Ethereal.

cards.name: Juggling Ball
cards.description:
Unplayable
jestermod:Bouncing, Ethereal.
When this card is Discarded or Exhausted, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Juggling Ball+
cards.description:
Unplayable
jestermod:Bouncing, Ethereal.
When this card is Discarded or Exhausted, deal 7 damage to a random enemy.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Trance
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to a random enemy.
Discard the top card from your draw pile, if this is a skill card, play *Trance again.

cards.name: Trance+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage to a random enemy.
Discard the top card from your draw pile, if this is a skill card, play *Trance again.

relics.name: Jester's cap
relics.description:
Every time you shuffle your deck, draw a card.
(Up to 3 times per turn)

relics.name: Bag of Tricks
relics.description: At the start of battle add a Prank to your hand, discard pile and draw pile.

relics.name: Large Sleeves
relics.description: Every 10 times you discard a card, draw a card.

relics.name: Jester's mask
relics.description: Every time you shuffle your deck, gain 1 life.

relics.name: Philosopher's Amphora
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Apply 1 Disposophobe to a random ennemy.
relics.flavorText: Smells weird, but you don't have the heart to throw it away.

relics.name: Defect's Essence
relics.description:
Blue cards can be obtained.
Gain 1 orb slot.

relics.name: HarlequinCap
relics.description:
When you shuffle your draw pile, choose a card from your draw pile and add it to your hand.
(Up to 3 times per turn)
Replaces Jester's Cap.

relics.name: Haunted Lute
relics.description: At the start of your turn, Gain [E] and discard a random card.
relics.flavorText: Engraves music deep within your soul.

relics.name: Joker Card
relics.description: Every 4 times you shuffle your deck, gain 1 intangible.

relics.name: Loaded Dice
relics.description: You can choose what cards are discarded when you recycle.

relics.name: Macho Brace
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, Gain [E] .
You can neither gain nor lose Strength or Dexterity.

relics.name: Mirror Mask
relics.description:
When you become Vulnerable, apply as many Vulnerable to a random enemy.
When you become Weakened, apply as many Weakened to a random enemy.

relics.name: Ruski's Broom
relics.description: When you discard a curse or status, Exhaust it.

keywords.name: Jestermod:Bouncing
keywords.description: When this card is discarded, it goes back to your hand.

keywords.name: Jestermod:Buried
keywords.description: At the start of battle, this card is discarded from your draw pile.

keywords.name: Jestermod:Elusive
keywords.description: When this card is drawn, you have 50% chance to discard it and draw another card.

keywords.name: Recycle
keywords.description: Discard X cards and draw as many cards.
